name: Letters of Boom by Richard Sherman
name_original: Letters of Boom by Richard Sherman
description:
Think Fast. Spell Faster. Letters of Boom by Richard Sherman!

** App Store Best New Game **

==============================

"Think Scrabble without the annoying wait for others to take their turn." - USA Today

"Game on." - TMZ

"Sherman’s influence is evident in the game’s use of an updated 21st century dictionary including slang, swagger, and so-called “Shermanisms.” - AppAdvice

==============================

A simple, addictive word game based on sorting letters, spelling words and blowing stuff up. A combination of fast anagramming, strategic choice, and intense impact.

Rack Your Brains
Richard Sherman brings both brains and boom onto the gridiron. His challenge to you? Bring the smarts and bring the speed – and rack your brains on a word game only he could imagine.

Slang and Swagger Included
A Dictionary for the 21st Century Letters of Boom comes installed with an updated dictionary full of slang, swagger and customized Shermanisms.

Join the Hall of Fame
Achievements put your skills to the test, leader-boards ratchet up the competition.

==================

GAME FEATURES:
- Innovative word game mechanic
- Voice over by Richard Sherman
- 2 Game modes - Classic and Blitz
- Updated 21st century dictionary
- Custom 80‘s inspired soundtrack
- Polished graphics and animations
- GameCenter integration
